lead_paragraph: The Southeastern Conference used a 20-second clock, in some instances, between pitches at its tournament, an attempt to speed up games.
snippet: The Southeastern Conference used a 20-second clock, in some instances, between pitches at its tournament, an attempt to speed up games.

headline.main: SEC Tournament Experiment Puts Baseball on the Clock
headline.seo: College Experiment Puts Baseball on the Clock
headline.print_headline: Boys of Summer, Leisurely No More, Are Put on Clock at SEC Tournament
